EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Seattle Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Seattle at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Wednesday, August 9, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Galvanize <[[https://www.galvanize.com/seattle/campus]]> Room: The Underground 111 S Jackson St, Seattle, WA 98104 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Galvanize/@47.5989507,-122.3338016,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xc82c719d1795d092?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjK34jE3bbVAhWJqlQKHYLDBLUQ_BIIeDAK]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions 3:45pm - 4:00pm Panel Q&A
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/seattle?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
